metadata.title: CVE-2021-43503 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability exists in h laravel 5.8.38 via an unserialize pop chain in (1) __destruct in \Routing\PendingResourceRegistration.php, (2) __cal in Queue\Capsule\Manager.php, and (3) __invoke in mockery\library\Mockery\ClosureWrapper.php.

criterions.comment: php-mockery package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
